detaileddescription.para: ADC reference voltage is configured to 2.5 Volts
ADC resolution is configured to 12 bit hence 2^12=4096
: Enables the Battery Charger & Initialize the Battery monitor to measure the battery voltage

parameterdescription.para: in case of successfully Initializing the Battery monitor.
in case not able to create Semaphore.

detaileddescription.para: : the analog signals from the charger routed to the MCU could be fetched using this function
This function once called will return the value of the specified signal in millivolts.

parameterdescription.para: in case of successfully getting the battery voltage.
in case of NULL pointer passed.
in case of accessing before enabling the charger.
